messages.content: Where is Presidency University in Bangalore?, do deep research on this

You are a research assistant conducting deep research. You have access to both live web search results and knowledge base documents.

=== WEB SEARCH RESULTS ===

AI Summary:
Presidency University is located in Yelahanka, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India. It was established in 2013 and offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses. The university campus is in Rajanukunte.

2. Presidency University, Bengaluru - Wikipedia
   URL: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Presidency_University,_Bengaluru
   Presidency University is a private university located in Rajanakunte, Yelahanka, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India. The university offers courses in Engineering, Management, Information Sciences, Design, Commerce, Law, Media Studies, Liberal Arts & Science and Allied Health Sciences.

## History

[edit]

Presidency University, established by eminent educationist-philanthropist Dr. Nissar Ahmed, is a private university established under the Presidency University Act (Karnataka State Act no. 41) in 2013 and is a part of the Presidency Group of Institutions.

The Group started its first school in the year 1976 and has gradually expanded to 8 schools, 4 junior colleges, and 1 college across of Bengaluru and Mangalore in Karnataka. [...] Presidency University, Bengaluru

## About Presidency University, Bangalore

Presidency University (PU) is a State Private University established under the Presidency University Act, 2013, located at Ittagallpura, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India PU is located on a sprawling campus of 40 acres, developed into a lush green landscape, with a State-of-the-Art infrastructure. The University has thus far constructed around 13.5 Lakh Sq. Ft. of Academic and Administrative infrastructure - modern Classrooms, Laboratory Spaces, Research Centres, Library and Digital Learning Spaces, Seminar Rooms and other student and amenities. With 35% of the soft-landscaped Campus set apart for the activities of students, in the form of [...] ## About Presidency University, Bangalore

   URL: https://www.shiksha.com/university/presidency-university-bangalore-47151
   ## Presidency University Bangalore Highlights 2025

Presidency University is a private university located in Yelahanaka, Bangalore. The university is recognised by the UGC and is approved by the AICTE. The university is also accredited with NAAC ‘A’ Grade. The university has been ranked 26th in Pan India in the Private University Category - Outlook I Care Best B School - 2024 rankings. Presidency University offers undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral level courses through seven schools across multiple streams such as Engineering, Management, Science, Law, etc. [...] Jasleen Taneja · Feb 1, 2026

# Program

## Ph.D Program

Presidency University Bengaluru invites applications for full time/ part time Ph.D degree programme. The objective of the programme is to enable the scholars to become top-class researchers in their chosen fields of study, leading to a Ph.D degree. [...] icon

##### Enquiry & Admission [...] Presidency University Bengaluru was established with a vision to bring about innovation in Higher Education and Learning, in emerging and established areas of knowledge. This Ph.D programme is in-line with the vision of the university to bring out the best talent in the country. The program focuses on producing well-structured and well-informed individuals who will be able to make meaningful contributions to society. The Ph.D programme is designed to provide students with the opportunity to explore new frontiers of knowledge and contribute to the development of their field of specialization. The programme is designed to meet the needs of the industry and academia and to produce highly qualified professionals. The programme is designed to foster collaboration among academics, industries and students. The Ph.D programme aims to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the subject matter and the skills required to carry out original research work. The programme provides opportunities for students to engage in interdisciplinary research, collaborations with faculty members, and interaction with experts from academia and industry.
